projectOverview.title: Text Adventure Game UI
projectOverview.description: A web-based user interface for interacting with the AI-generated text adventure game.
goals: Provide a user-friendly interface for game interaction
Display game world visuals and text logs

functional: Display a text input box for user commands
Include a submit button to send commands
Show a text log of previous interactions
Display a large image pane for game visuals
nonFunctional: The UI should have a navy blue theme
The interface should be responsive and work on various screen sizes

textInputBox.description: A text box for entering user commands

attributes.style: padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 16px; background-color: #001f3f; color: white; border: none; cursor: pointer;

submitButton.description: Button to submit the user's command

attributes.style: height: 200px; overflow-y: auto; background-color: #f0f8ff; padding: 10px; border: 1px solid #001f3f; margin-bottom: 10px;

textLog.description: A scrollable area displaying previous interactions

attributes.style: height: 400px; background-color: #001f3f; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; color: white; font-size: 24px;

imagePane.description: A pane for displaying game visuals

layout.description: The layout of the UI components from top to bottom

styles.description: The color scheme and font settings for the UI

constraints: The UI must be intuitive and easy to navigate
All components should be styled consistently with the navy blue theme

glossary.Text Log: A component that displays a history of user interactions
glossary.Image Pane: A component that displays visual elements of the game
